thread.title: The regulator in the Range hat: How politicians, DEP became cozy with shale drillers
thread.title_full: The regulator in the Range hat: How politicians, DEP became cozy with shale drillers - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: The regulator in the Range hat: How politicians, DEP became cozy with shale drillers
text: Mike Krancer announced he was stepping down as Pennsylvania 's environmental secretary in March 2013 , having led a reorganization that shifted shale enforcement decisions to Harrisburg and accelerated the permitting process for drillers.
